abstract: The release of a new Google Maps app for the iPhone may help Apple customers find their way, but it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to improve its own service.
snippet: The release of a new Google Maps app for the iPhone may help Apple customers find their way, but it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to improve its own service.
lead_paragraph: The return of a Google-powered maps application to the iPhone may make it easier for Apple’s customers to find their way. But it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to bring its own maps service up to snuff.

headline.main: While Apple Regroups, Google Offers a Maps App
headline.print_headline: While Apple Regroups, Google Offers A Maps App

abstract: Google’s maps app for the iPhone offers smooth navigation and intelligent directions for driving, walking and public transportation.
snippet: Google’s maps app for the iPhone offers smooth navigation and intelligent directions for driving, walking and public transportation.
lead_paragraph: It was one of the biggest tech headlines of the year: in September, Apple dropped its contract with Google, which had always supplied the data for the iPhone’s Maps app. For various strategic reasons, Apple preferred to write a new app, based on a new database of the world that Apple intended to assemble itself.

headline.main: Maps App for iPhone Steers Right
headline.print_headline: Maps App For iPhone Steers Right

abstract: The European Commission settled its antitrust case against Apple and four book publishing groups over price fixing.
snippet: The European Commission settled its antitrust case against Apple and four book publishing groups over price fixing.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — The European Commission settled its antitrust case against Apple and four book publishing groups over e-book price fixing on Thursday, in what was described as a victory for the leading online seller, Amazon, and a setback for publishers fighting for the ability to set prices for electronic literature in the digital marketplace.

headline.main: In Europe, Publishers Dealt a Setback Over e-Book Pricing
headline.print_headline: In Europe, Ruling Deals Publishers A Setback
